system.description: Effect: For 5 activations, the user gains the Orbit . When the user is hit by a [Contact] Attack while they have Orbit, the attacker takes a Tick of HP damage.

actions.name: Asteroid Belt
actions.description: Effect: For 5 activations, the user gains the Orbit condition. When the user is hit by a [Contact] Attack while they have Orbit, the attacker takes a Tick of HP damage.
